title: Revealing the importance of non-radical mechanisms in the degradation of sulfamethazine by Lewis acid-etched Co@MXene-activated peroxyacetic acid
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00453A, Paper
Dezhu Liu, Siling Zhang, Zhenwei Zou, Zheng Fang, Ping Chen, Zongshun Yu, Xiaoyu Zhang, Zhenchao Li, Zili Lin, Wenying Lv, Guoguang Liu
Co@MXene activation of peracetic acid and degradation of sulfamethazine via two major pathways: non-radical activation and organic radical activation.
